Description: Body sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with added white band; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ10.
Curator's comments: Φ10 is written in pencil on the exterior surface of the sherd. Many kantharoi Type B have painted inscriptions beneath the rim and several have been found on Aegina as well as at Naukratis (Williams 1983, 169).
Bibliographic references: Cook & Woodhead 1952 / Painted Inscriptions on Chiot Pottery (p. 168, no. 130)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 726, no. 855)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1754) (phase 2)
